rules_text: Create a Blood token, a Clue token, a Food token, a Glyph token, a Scrap token, and a Treasure token. [i](Blood has “{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.” Glyphs have “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.” Scrap has “{3}, Sacrifice this artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
notes:
Inspiration — Ancient/Alien artifacts

Mechanical Uniqueness — Rune tokens by Andrew, Scrap tokens by SammySammyson

**Designer’s note: Only the least evergreen tokens got their effect in the reminder text.

Have it make a single Blood Clue Food Rune Scap Treasure token for {G}?
